topic.title: Integrating Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author

body.p: It is possible to integrate the Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author, an advanced AI-powered solution designed to assist content creators and technical writers throughout every stage of the writing process. The Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author plugin can be installed on a Web Author server to make the AI Positron pane accessible.
You can download the plugin from here: Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author Installation.
For installation and configuration details, see Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author.
For information about the AI Positron pane its features, see AI Positron Pane (Web Author).
